author: Katelyn Polantz, CNN
title: Deaf association sues to force White House to use sign language interpreters at coronavirus briefings
description: The National Association of the Deaf and five deaf Americans are suing the White House in an attempt to force President Donald Trump and other top officials to have American Sign Language interpreters at Covid-19 briefings.

title: They didn't think Covid-19 would affect them, then they caught it
description: Arizona couple Debi and Michael Patterson say they "paid the price" for not following coronavirus safety precautions and urge everyone to wear a mask after both were hospitalized with the virus.
content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.
source.name: CNN

author: Natasha Chen, CNN
title: One teacher has resigned and others are concerned for their health after being forced to work at school while students go virtual
